CustomField.description: When checked the Price Rule is considered available for assignment and is considered when auto-calculating the appropriate price for a Item on Invoices, Sales Orders, Receipts, and EPayments. Defaults checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked the Price Rule is considered available for assignment and is considered when auto-calculating the appropriate price for a Item on Invoices, Sales Orders, Receipts, and EPayments. Defaults checked.
CustomField.label: Is Active
